lead_paragraph: District officials had demanded an end to the school’s arrangement with Club Damani, which had been operating on the premises during off-hours despite an expired liquor license.

keywords.value: Harambee Institute of Science and Technology Charter School
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Last Call for Nightclub in a School
